snippet: By buying Frommer's travel guides, Google has set competitors like Yelp and TripAdvisor on edge. But, as an analyst points out, Google is publishing its own reviews because its first attempts at collecting reviews also angered competitors.
abstract: By buying Frommer's travel guides, Google has set competitors like Yelp and TripAdvisor on edge. But, as an analyst points out, Google is publishing its own reviews because its first attempts at collecting reviews also angered competitors.

headline.main: Did Yelp and TripAdvisor Push Google to Compete?
